scripts.buildScript: node set-build-dir.cjs && npm run buildBranch && npm run addpush && npm run deploymain
scripts.addpush: git add . &&  git commit -m "update week1-vite" && git push origin week1-vite
scripts.deploymain: git checkout main && git pull origin main && git merge week1-vite && git add . && git commit -m "Merge week1-vite into main" && git push origin main && git checkout week1-vite
scripts.deploy: git checkout main && git pull origin main && git merge week1-vite && git add . && git commit -m "Merge week1-vite into main" && git push origin main && git checkout week1-vite
